title: Hebrew, Arabic, Romanian & Ukrainian Language Support
summary: Frames continues its mission to serve analog photographers worldwide with this significant localization update, bringing native support for Hebrew, Arabic, Romanian, and Ukrainian speakers, alongside refined translations and interface improvements throughout the entire app.

sections.content: Four New Languages with Right-to-Left Support

Frames now supports Hebrew, Arabic, Romanian, and Ukrainian, each carefully localized to respect cultural nuances and photography terminology. Hebrew and Arabic include full right-to-left interface adaptation. Navigation flows, button placement, and text alignment all mirror appropriately while preserving technical terms like film stock codes and aperture values in their standard international format.

items.title: Hebrew (עברית) & Arabic (العربية)
items.description: Complete RTL interface with native terminology for film stocks, camera settings, and EXIF metadata.

items.title: Romanian (Română) & Ukrainian (Українська)
items.description: Full translations supporting photographers documenting their work in their native language.

sections.alt: Frames film photography app with Hebrew and Arabic RTL interface and language support

sections.content: Beyond new languages, we've refined existing translations throughout the app based on feedback from photographers. Film stock names remain in their original language (Kodak Portra, Ilford HP5), while interface elements adapt to your chosen language. Language preferences sync across devices, and all existing data automatically displays in your selected language without re-entry or migration.

improvements: Added complete Hebrew (עברית) localization with right-to-left interface support
Added complete Arabic (العربية) localization with RTL layout adaptation
Added Romanian (Română) translation for the film photography community
Added Ukrainian (Українська) support with native terminology
Refined existing translations across all supported languages for improved clarity and consistency
Improved technical terminology accuracy in photography-specific fields
Enhanced bidirectional text support for mixed Latin and RTL content

fixes.title: Text Overflow in Translations
fixes.description: Resolved layout issues where longer translated phrases could be truncated in certain interface elements.

fixes.title: RTL Layout Consistency
fixes.description: Fixed minor alignment issues in right-to-left languages to ensure proper mirroring across all screens.
